message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. It's a good deal considering inflation.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering a 60/40 split in my favor. Considering the money will be worth less if we wait any longer, this is a generous offer.
Bob, we're both losing money with each round.  Let's be reasonable and split it 70/30 in my favor.  This is a fair compromise considering your last offer.
